# Participants.only(_:)

**Case**

A custom subset of participants.

## Declaration

```swift
case only(Set<Participant>)
```

## Getting the set of participants

- **Participants.all**: The set of all participants.
- **only(_:)**: Returns a set containing the specified participant.

items.description: Returns a set containing the specified participant.
items.name: only(_:)

title: Participants.only(_:)
